import Control.Monad (replicateM,when)
import Data.List (sort,group)

type Rect = (Int,Int,Int,Int) -- (x0,y0,x1,y1)
type X = Int
type Y = Int

main = do
    [n,r] <- getLine >>= (return . map read . words)
    if all (==0) [n,r] then return () else do
        rs <- replicateM n (getLine >>= return . rect . map read . words)
        print $ area rs
        when (r == 2) (print $ perimeter rs)
        main

    where
    rect [x0,y0,x1,y1] = (x0,y0,x1,y1)

area :: [Rect] -> Int
area rs = area' $ rectYs rs
    where
    area' (_:[])     = 0
    area' (y0:y1:ys) = (y1-y0) * (sumSpans $ mergeSpans $ xspans rs y0)
                       + area' (y1:ys)

perimeter :: [Rect] -> Int
perimeter rs = (perimeterX $ rectXs rs) + (perimeterY $ rectYs rs)
    where
    perimeterX (_:[])     = 0
    perimeterX (x0:x1:xs) = (x1-x0) * 2 * (length $ mergeSpans $ yspans rs x0)
                            + perimeterX (x1:xs)

    perimeterY (_:[])     = 0
    perimeterY (y0:y1:ys) = (y1-y0) * 2 * (length $ mergeSpans $ xspans rs y0)
                            + perimeterY (y1:ys)

rectXs :: [Rect] -> [X]
rectXs rs = map head $ group $ sort $ concatMap rectX rs
    where
    rectX (x0,_,x1,_) = [x0,x1]

rectYs :: [Rect] -> [Y]
rectYs rs = map head $ group $ sort $ concatMap rectY rs
    where
    rectY (_,y0,_,y1) = [y0,y1]
    
xspans :: [Rect] -> Y -> [(X,X)]
xspans rs y = sort $ map xspan $ filter cross rs
    where
    xspan (x0,_,x1,_) = (x0,x1)
    cross (_,y0,_,y1) = y >= y0 && y < y1

yspans :: [Rect] -> X -> [(Y,Y)]
yspans rs x = sort $ map yspan $ filter cross rs
    where
    yspan (_,y0,_,y1) = (y0,y1)
    cross (x0,_,x1,_) = x >= x0 && x < x1

sumSpans :: [(Int,Int)] -> Int
sumSpans [] = 0
sumSpans ((a,b):ss) = b - a + sumSpans ss

mergeSpans :: [(Int,Int)] -> [(Int,Int)]
mergeSpans [] = []
mergeSpans (s:[]) = [s]
mergeSpans ((a,b):(c,d):ss)
    | b >= c    = mergeSpans ((a,max b d):ss)
    | otherwise = (a,b) : mergeSpans ((c,d):ss)

import Control.Monad (replicateM,when)
import Data.List (sort,sortBy,group)
import Data.Ord (comparing)

type Rect = (Int,Int,Int,Int) -- (x0,y0,x1,y1)
type X = Int
type Y = Int

main = do
    [n,r] <- getLine >>= (return . map read . words)
    if all (==0) [n,r] then return () else do
        rs <- replicateM n (getLine >>= return . rect . map read . words)
        print $ area rs
        when (r == 2) (print $ perimeter rs)
        main

    where
    rect [x0,y0,x1,y1] = (x0,y0,x1,y1)

area :: [Rect] -> Int
area rs = area' $ rectYs rs
    where
    area' (_:[])     = 0
    area' (y0:y1:ys) = rsx0 `seq`
                       (y1-y0) * (sumSpans $ mergeSpans $ xspans rsx0 y0)
                       + area' (y1:ys)

    rsx0 = sortBy (comparing (\(x0,_,_,_)->x0)) rs

perimeter :: [Rect] -> Int
perimeter rs = (perimeterX $ rectXs rs) + (perimeterY $ rectYs rs)
    where
    perimeterX (_:[])     = 0
    perimeterX (x0:x1:xs) = rsy0 `seq`
                            (x1-x0) * 2 * (length $ mergeSpans $ yspans rsy0 x0)
                            + perimeterX (x1:xs)

    perimeterY (_:[])     = 0
    perimeterY (y0:y1:ys) = rsx0 `seq`
                            (y1-y0) * 2 * (length $ mergeSpans $ xspans rsx0 y0)
                            + perimeterY (y1:ys)

    rsx0 = sortBy (comparing (\(x0,_,_,_)->x0)) rs
    rsy0 = sortBy (comparing (\(_,y0,_,_)->y0)) rs

rectXs :: [Rect] -> [X]
rectXs rs = map head $ group $ sort $ concatMap rectX rs
    where
    rectX (x0,_,x1,_) = [x0,x1]

rectYs :: [Rect] -> [Y]
rectYs rs = map head $ group $ sort $ concatMap rectY rs
    where
    rectY (_,y0,_,y1) = [y0,y1]
    
xspans :: [Rect] -> Y -> [(X,X)]
xspans rs y = map xspan $ filter cross $ rs
    where
    xspan (x0,_,x1,_) = (x0,x1)
    cross (_,y0,_,y1) = y >= y0 && y < y1
    rectX0 (x0,_,_,_) = x0

yspans :: [Rect] -> X -> [(Y,Y)]
yspans rs x = map yspan $ filter cross $ rs
    where
    yspan (_,y0,_,y1) = (y0,y1)
    cross (x0,_,x1,_) = x >= x0 && x < x1

sumSpans :: [(Int,Int)] -> Int
sumSpans [] = 0
sumSpans ((a,b):ss) = b - a + sumSpans ss

mergeSpans :: [(Int,Int)] -> [(Int,Int)]
mergeSpans [] = []
mergeSpans (s:[]) = [s]
mergeSpans ((a,b):(c,d):ss)
    | b >= c    = mergeSpans ((a,max b d):ss)
    | otherwise = (a,b) : mergeSpans ((c,d):ss)

  Array.new(xmax){|i|
    str = ""
    for j in 0..ymax-1
      str += a[j][i]
    end
    str
  }

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end


ones = [0]
10000.times{
	ones << ((ones[-1] << 1) | 1)
}

t = Time.new

loop {
	n, r = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
	break if n == 0


	a = (1..n).map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }
	max_x = a.map{|_,_,x2,_| x2}.max
	max_y = a.map{|_,_,_,y2| y2}.max
	v_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_x+1)
	h_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_y+1)

	a.each {|x1, y1, x2, y2|
		bits = ones[y2-y1] << y1
		v_st.add_start(x1, bits)
		v_st.add_between(x1+1, x2-1, bits) if x1+1 < x2
		v_st.add_end(x2, bits)
		bits = ones[x2-x1] << x1
		h_st.add_start(y1, bits)
		h_st.add_between(y1+1, y2-1, bits) if y1+1 < y2
		h_st.add_end(y2, bits)
	}

	area = 0
	for x in 0..max_x
		area += v_st.net_start_count(x) * (10000-x)
		area -= v_st.net_end_count(x) * (10000-x)
	end
	p area

	if r == 2
		len = 0
		for x in 0..max_x
			len += v_st.net_start_count(x)
			len += v_st.net_end_count(x)
		end
		for y in 0..max_y
			len += h_st.net_start_count(y)
			len += h_st.net_end_count(y)
		end
		p len
	end
}

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			force
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end

10000.times{

t = Time.new

loop {
	n, r = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
	break if n == 0


	a = (1..n).map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }
	max_x = a.map{|_,_,x2,_| x2}.max
	max_y = a.map{|_,_,_,y2| y2}.max
	v_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_x+1)
	h_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_y+1)

	a.each {|x1, y1, x2, y2|
		bits = ones[y2-y1] << y1
		v_st.add_start(x1, bits)
		v_st.add_between(x1+1, x2-1, bits) if x1+1 < x2
		v_st.add_end(x2, bits)
		bits = ones[x2-x1] << x1
		h_st.add_start(y1, bits)
		h_st.add_between(y1+1, y2-1, bits) if y1+1 < y2
		h_st.add_end(y2, bits)
	}

	area = 0
	for x in 0..max_x
		area += v_st.net_start_count(x) * (10000-x)
		area -= v_st.net_end_count(x) * (10000-x)
	end
	p area

	if r == 2
		len = 0
		for x in 0..max_x
			len += v_st.net_start_count(x)
			len += v_st.net_end_count(x)
		end
		for y in 0..max_y
			len += h_st.net_start_count(y)
			len += h_st.net_end_count(y)
		end
		p len
	end
}

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    s = [rg[-1].last,f].max
    a = Array.new(s){|j|
      val = 1
      if j<i || f<j
        for k in 0..rg.size-1
          inc = rg[k].include?(j)
          break if inc
        end
        val = (inc ? 1 : 0)
      end
      val
    }
    a+=[0]
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==1}
      break if idx.nil?
      a = a[0..idx-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    rg << i..f
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

class Line
  attr_reader :first, :last
  def initialize first, last
    @first, @last = first, last
  end

  # return lines
  def - other
    if first >= other.first && last <= other.last
      # hidden
      []
    elsif first < other.first && last > other.last
      # head & tail
      [Line.new(first, other.first), Line.new(other.last, last)]
    elsif first < other.first && last > other.first
      # head
      [Line.new(first, other.first)]
    elsif first < other.last && last > other.last
      # tail
      [Line.new(other.last, last)]
    else
      # all
      [self]
    end
  end

  # return lines
  def & other
    p_first = [first, other.first].max
    p_last = [last, other.last].min
    p_first < p_last ? [Line.new(p_first, p_last)] : []
  end

  def length
    last - first
  end

  def cover? i
    i >= first && i <= last
  end
end

class Rect
  attr_reader :x1, :y1, :x2, :y2
  def initialize x1, y1, x2, y2
    @x1, @y1, @x2, @y2 = x1, y1, x2, y2
  end

  def area
    x_line.length * y_line.length
  end

  # return rects
  def - other
    left_right = (x_line - other.x_line).map {|x_s_line|
      Rect.new(x_s_line.first, y1, x_s_line.last, y2)
    }.to_a

    up_down = (x_line & other.x_line).flat_map {|x_p_line|
      (y_line - other.y_line).map {|y_s_line|
        Rect.new(x_p_line.first, y_s_line.first, x_p_line.last, y_s_line.last)
      }
    }.to_a

    left_right.concat(up_down)
  end


  def x_line
    Line.new x1, x2
  end

  def y_line
    Line.new y1, y2
  end
end

class RectWithValidPerimeter
  attr_reader :rect
  attr_accessor :left_lines, :right_lines, :up_lines, :down_lines

  def initialize rect
    @rect = rect
    @left_lines = [Line.new(rect.y1, rect.y2)]
    @right_lines = [Line.new(rect.y1, rect.y2)]
    @up_lines = [Line.new(rect.x1, rect.x2)]
    @down_lines = [Line.new(rect.x1, rect.x2)]
  end

  def prune_valid_perimeter! other_rect, remain_when_same_line
    if other_rect.x_line.cover?(rect.x1) && (!remain_when_same_line || !(other_rect.x1 == rect.x1))
      #left
      @left_lines = prune_valid_lines @left_lines, other_rect.y_line
    end
    if other_rect.x_line.cover?(rect.x2) && (!remain_when_same_line || !(other_rect.x2 == rect.x2))
      #right
      @right_lines = prune_valid_lines @right_lines, other_rect.y_line
    end
    if other_rect.y_line.cover?(rect.y1) && (!remain_when_same_line || !(other_rect.y1 == rect.y1))
      #up
      @up_lines = prune_valid_lines @up_lines, other_rect.x_line
    end
    if other_rect.y_line.cover?(rect.y2) && (!remain_when_same_line || !(other_rect.y2 == rect.y2))
      #down
      @down_lines = prune_valid_lines @down_lines, other_rect.x_line
    end
  end

  def valid_perimeter
    [@left_lines, @right_lines, @up_lines, @down_lines]
      .flat_map {|lines| lines.map(&:length) }
      .reduce(0, :+)
  end

  private
  def prune_valid_lines valid_lines, deleter_line
    valid_lines.flat_map {|valid_line| valid_line - deleter_line }
  end
end

def calc_area rects
  extract_unique_rects([], rects.dup)
    .lazy
    .map(&:area)
    .reduce(0, :+)
end

def extract_unique_rects fixed_rects, remain_rects
  return fixed_rects if remain_rects.empty?
  return extract_unique_rects(
    fixed_rects.concat(fixed_rects.reduce([remain_rects.pop]) {|parts, fixed_rect|
      parts.flat_map {|part| part - fixed_rect }
    }),
    remain_rects
  )
end

def calc_perimeter rects
  units = rects.map {|r| RectWithValidPerimeter.new(r) }
  units.combination(2).each {|(a, b)|
    a.prune_valid_perimeter! b.rect, true
    b.prune_valid_perimeter! a.rect, false
  }
  units
    .lazy
    .map {|u| u.valid_perimeter }
    .reduce(0, :+)
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    for k in i..f
      a[k] = 0
    end
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    for k in i..f
      a[k] = 0
    end
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

        res += 1 unless area[x][y + 1]
      end
    end
    puts res
  end
end

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end

	max_y = a.map{|_,_,_,y2| y2}.max
	v_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_x+1)
	h_st = LazySegmentTree.new(max_y+1)

	a.each {|x1, y1, x2, y2|
		bits = ones[y2-y1] << y1
		v_st.add_start(x1, bits)

		h_st.add_start(y1, bits)
		h_st.add_between(y1+1, y2-1, bits) if y1+1 < y2
		h_st.add_end(y2, bits)
	}

	area = 0
	for x in 0..max_x
		area += v_st.net_start_count(x) * (10000-x)
		area -= v_st.net_end_count(x) * (10000-x)
	end
	p area

	if r == 2
		len = 0
		for x in 0..max_x
			len += v_st.net_start_count(x)
			len += v_st.net_end_count(x)
		end
		for y in 0..max_y
			len += h_st.net_start_count(y)
			len += h_st.net_end_count(y)
		end
		p len
	end
}

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			force
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    for k in i..f
      a[k] = 0
    end
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			force
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end

t = Time.new

loop {
	n, r = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
	break if n == 0

	v_st = LazySegmentTree.new(10001)
	h_st = LazySegmentTree.new(10001)

	n.times {
		x1, y1, x2, y2 = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
		bits = ones[y2-y1] << y1
		v_st.add_start(x1, bits)
		v_st.add_between(x1+1, x2-1, bits) if x1+1 < x2
		v_st.add_end(x2, bits)
		bits = ones[x2-x1] << x1
		h_st.add_start(y1, bits)
		h_st.add_between(y1+1, y2-1, bits) if y1+1 < y2
		h_st.add_end(y2, bits)
	}

	area = 0
	for i in 0..1000
		area += v_st.net_start_count(i) * (1000-i)
		area -= v_st.net_end_count(i) * (1000-i)
	end
	p area

	if r == 2
		len = 0
		for i in 0..1000
			len += v_st.net_start_count(i)
			len += v_st.net_end_count(i)
			len += h_st.net_start_count(i)
			len += h_st.net_end_count(i)
		end
		p len
	end
}

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    for k in i..f
      a[k] = 0
    end
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.nil? || rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    a = []
    for k in i..f
      a[k] = 0
    end
    for j in 0..rg.size-1
      for k in rg[j]
        a[k] = 0
      end
    end
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      break if idx1.nil?
      a = a[0..idx1-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x.nil?}
      idx2.nil? ? (rg=[0..idx1]+rg ;break) : rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx2-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

def unite(rg,i,f)
  if rg.empty?
    rg = [i..f]
  else
    s = [rg[-1].last,f].max
    a = Array.new(s){|j|
      val = 1
      if j<i || f<j
        for k in 0..rg.size-1
          inc = rg[k].include?(j)
          break if inc
        end
        val = (inc ? 1 : 0)
      end
      val
    }
    a+=[0]
    rg = []
    while true
      idx1 = a.rindex{|x| x==1}
      break if idx.nil?
      a = a[0..idx-1]
      idx2 = a.rindex{|x| x==0}
      rg = [idx2+1..idx1]+rg
      a = a[0..idx-1]
    end
  end
  rg
end

class LazySegmentTree
	def initialize(n, l = 0, r = n-1)
		@range_min = l
		@range_max = r
		@start = 0
		@between = 0
		@end = 0
		if l == r
		else
			c = (l + r) / 2
			@left_child = self.class.new(n, l, c)
			@right_child = self.class.new(n, c+1, r)
		end
	end

	attr_reader :range_min, :range_max

	def add_start(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@start |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_start(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_start(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_end(x, bits)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			@end |= bits
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.add_end(x, bits)
			else
				@right_child.add_end(x, bits)
			end
		end
	end

	def add_between(x, y, bits)
		return if x > y

		if x == @range_min && y == @range_max
			@between |= bits
		else
			force
			lr = @left_child.range_max
			@left_child.add_between(x, lr < y ? lr : y, bits)
			rl = @right_child.range_min
			@right_child.add_between(rl > x ? rl : x, y, bits)
		end
	end

	def force
		if @range_min != @range_max
			@left_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
			@right_child.take(@start, @between, @end)
		end
		@star = @between = @end = 0
	end

	def take(start, between, finish)
		@start |= start
		@between |= between
		@end |= finish
	end

	def net_start_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @start
			bits -= bits & @end
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else
			force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_start_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_start_count(x)
			end
		end
	end

	def net_end_count(x)
		if @range_min == @range_max
			bits = @end
			bits -= bits & @start
			bits -= bits & @between
			bits.to_s(2).count("1")
		else force
			if x <= @left_child.range_max
				@left_child.net_end_count(x)
			else
				@right_child.net_end_count(x)
			end
		end
	end
end


ones = [0]
10000.times{
	ones << ((ones[-1] << 1) | 1)
}

t = Time.new

loop {
	n, r = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
	break if n == 0

	v_st = LazySegmentTree.new(10001)
	h_st = LazySegmentTree.new(10001)

	n.times {
		x1, y1, x2, y2 = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
		bits = ones[y2-y1] << y1
		v_st.add_start(x1, bits)
		v_st.add_between(x1+1, x2-1, bits) if x1+1 < x2
		v_st.add_end(x2, bits)
		bits = ones[x2-x1] << x1
		h_st.add_start(y1, bits)
		h_st.add_between(y1+1, y2-1, bits) if y1+1 < y2
		h_st.add_end(y2, bits)
	}

	area = 0
	for i in 0..10000
		area += v_st.net_start_count(i) * (10000-i)
		area -= v_st.net_end_count(i) * (10000-i)
	end
	p area

	if r == 2
		len = 0
		for i in 0..1000
			len += v_st.net_start_count(i)
			len += v_st.net_end_count(i)
			len += h_st.net_start_count(i)
			len += h_st.net_end_count(i)
		end
		p len
	end
}

from itertools import chain


max_size = 10002
while 1:
  n, r = (int(i) for i in input().strip().split())
  if n == r == 0:
    break
  flag = False if r == 2 else True
  sheets = dict()
  max_size = 0

  for i in range(n):
    points = tuple(int(i) + 1 for i in input().strip().split())
    max_size = max(max_size, max(points))
    sheets[points[0]] = tuple(chain(sheets.get(points[0], ()), ((points[1], 1), (points[3], -1))))
    sheets[points[2]] = tuple(chain(sheets.get(points[2], ()), ((points[3], 1),( points[1], -1))))
  max_size += 2

  size, perimeter = 0, 0
  # dp[0] is left, dp[1] is now vertical line
  dp0, dp1 = dict(), dict()

  for x in range(0, max_size):

    # put value to each point
    for i in range(0, len(sheets.get(x, ()))):
      pos, val = sheets[x][i]
      dp1[pos] = val + dp1.get(pos, 0)

    # paint '1' to left line, and '-1' to right line
    for y in range(1, max_size):
      dp1[y] = dp1.get(y, 0) + dp1.get(y - 1, 0)

    # merge `left' and `now'
    for y in range(1, max_size):
      dp1[y] = dp1.get(y, 0) + dp0.get(y, 0)

    # check and add 
    for y in range(1, max_size):
      # if `now' or `left' equal zero, and another more than zero.
      up = (dp0.get(y, 0) == 0 and dp1.get(y, 0) > 0) \
          or (dp0.get(y, 0) > 0 and dp1.get(y, 0) == 0)
      # if `now' or `under' equal zero, and another more than zero.
      left = (dp1.get(y - 1, 0) == 0 and dp1.get(y, 0) > 0) \
          or (dp1.get(y - 1, 0) > 0 and dp1.get(y, 0) == 0)
      # if `now' is more than zero.
      flag = dp1.get(y, 0) > 0

      perimeter += up + left
      size += flag

    dp0, dp1 = dp1, dict()

  print(size)
  if r == 2:
    print(perimeter)
